alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:52PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 151 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Truckton to near Hanover to near Pueblo West. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Damaging winds could extend well ahead of thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Pueblo, Boone, Avondale, Pueblo Depot, Pinon and Pueblo West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
